content.rendered:
Cobham Aviation Services Australia (formerly National Jet Systems), is a scheduled and charter airline with its headquarters in Adelaide, South Australia. It was established in 1989.

 

Cobham Aviation Services Adelaide Airport, Australia Address, Phone number

Adelaide office,
1 National Drive, Adelaide Airport, South Australia 5950
Phone:
 +61 (0) 8 8154 7000

Cobham Aviation Services Adelaide, Australia Address, Phone number

Adelaide VIP terminal,
28 James Schofield Drive, Adelaide Airport, South Australia 5950
Phone:
 +61 (0) 487 818 599

Cobham Aviation Services Perth, Australia Address, Phone number

Perth office/terminal,
26 Valentine Road, Perth Domestic Airport, Western Australia 6105

Phone:
+61 (0) 8 9479 9700

Cobham’s Customer Contact Centre number: +61 8 9479 9700

Cobham Aviation Services Media enquiries number

Ball Public Relations Phone number: +61 (0) 8 8223 7305

Passenger and aircraft charter service centre phone number: 1800 105 503

Cobham Aviation Services Official website: https://www.cobhamaviationservices.com/

Cobham Aviation Services Online Check-in: www.cobhamaviationservices.com/online check-in

Note Check in is available 24 hrs before and upto 3 hrs prior to scheduled departure.

Check Cobham Aviation Services schedule here: www.cobhamaviationservices.com/flight schedule

Check Cobham Aviation Services flight status here: www.cobhamaviationservices.com/flight status

Cobham Aviation Services Baggage Allowance

Cobham Aviation Services Baggage

View Cobham Aviation Services Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage in the above link.

Cobham Aviation Services special assistance

For any special assistance, call before 48 hours

Cobham’s Customer Contact Centre on +61 8 9479 9700 (option 1)

In-Flight meal at Cobham Aviation Services

Dietary requirements

For in-flight meal, please call before 48 hours. Tea, coffee, juice, soft drinks and water are provided free of charge.

Travelling while pregnant in Cobham Aviation Services

Cobham’s guidelines for permissible travel whilst pregnant are as follows:

Pregnant mothers can travel in Cobham aviation till 28 weeks without any medical certificate. After 28 weeks,

medical clearance from a doctor or midwife is required stating the following:

  • estimated date of delivery;
  • single or multiple pregnancy;
  • absence of complications; and
  • passenger is ‘fit to fly’ (it must specifically state that the passenger is ‘fit to fly’ as fit to travel is not sufficient and will not be accepted).

For more details on special assistance, please visit https://www.cobhamaviationservices.com/flying-with-us/passenger-information/passengers-requiring-assistance/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Cobham Aviation Services

Total fleet: 34

Boeing 717

  • Boeing 717-200

British Aerospace BAe 146/Avro RJ

  • British Aerospace 146-100
  • British Aerospace 146-200
  • British Aerospace 146-300
  • British Aerospace RJ100
  • British Aerospace Avro RJ85/li>

De Havilland Canada DHC-8 Dash 8

  • De Havilland Canada DHC-8-100
  • De Havilland Canada DHC-8-300

Embraer ERJ-190

  • Embraer ERJ-190

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Cobham Aviation Services Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Cobham Aviation Services Australia: (click on the stars below)
